verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: In a new interview with David Letterman] , [ARG0: Howard Stern] [V: said] [ARG1: that Donald Trump was always a very forthcoming guest on his radio show , and that he once rated his own daughter a 10 on the hotness scale] .

In a new interview with David Letterman , Howard Stern said that [ARG1: Donald Trump] [V: was] [ARGM-TMP: always] [ARG2: a very forthcoming guest on his radio show] , and that he once rated his own daughter a 10 on the hotness scale .

In a new interview with David Letterman , Howard Stern said that Donald Trump was always a very forthcoming guest on his radio show , and that [ARG0: he] [ARGM-TMP: once] [V: rated] [ARG1: his own daughter] [ARG2: a 10 on the hotness scale] .
